resources.string: Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts. Separated they live in Bookmarksgrove right at the coast of the Semantics, a large language ocean. A small river named Duden flows by their place and supplies it with the necessary regelialia. It is a paradisematic country, in which roasted parts of sentences fly into your mouth. Even the all-powerful Pointing has no control about the blind texts it is an almost unorthographic life One day however a small line of blind text by the name of Lorem Ipsum decided to leave for the far World of Grammar.

Phasellus viverra nulla ut metus varius laoreet. Quisque rutrum. Aenean imperdiet. Etiam ultricies nisi vel augue. Curabitur ullamcorper ultricies nisi. Nam eget dui. Etiam rhoncus. Maecenas nec odio et ante tincidunt tempus. Donec vitae sapien ut libero venenatis faucibus. Nullam quis ante. Etiam sit amet orci eget eros faucibus tincidunt. Duis leo. Sed fringilla mauris sit amet nibh. Donec sodales sagittis magna. Sed consequat, leo eget bibendum sodales, augue velit cursus nunc, quis gravida magna mi a libero.

这些诉讼均指控称，法拉第未来在与这些公司签订合同后不久就对它们进行了欺诈。过去，法拉第未来就曾遇到过类似指控，比如在2017年的财政危机中，该公司欠下了大约1亿美元的未付账单。但从整体上看，这些新诉讼让我们对法拉第未来所欠债务以及债主身份有了更清晰的认识。法拉第未来首席财务官迈克尔·阿古斯塔(Michael Agosta)去年在法庭文件中承认，截至2018年10月，这家初创公司欠供应商“超过5900万美元”。而新的诉讼表明，现在其欠债总额可能要高得多。法拉第未来的代表没有回复记者的置评请求。与此同时，这些诉讼恰好发生在法拉第未来几乎耗尽现金的时候。2018年末，法拉第未来与中国房地产集团恒大(Evergrande)陷入法律纠纷中，后者是法拉第未来的主要财务支持者，这场纠纷再次将法拉第未来推向悬崖边缘。
